entry.title: hexo(헥소) 글 쓰기, 수정하기, 삭제하기
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment
entry.summary: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

entry.title: Welcome to Tranquilpeak
entry.summary: Tranquilpeak is a gorgeous responsive theme for Hexo blog framework. It has many features and integrated services to improve user experience.

entry.title: Elements showcase
entry.content:
Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Paragraph

entry.summary: Tranquilpeak has a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.

entry.title: highlighted code showcase
entry.content:
Tranquilpeak Hexo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

Tabbed code block

ApacheConf

Bash

Coffeescript

C++

Clojure

CShparp

CSS

DIFF

HTTP

INI

Java

JavaScript

JSON

Makefile

Markdown

Nginx

Objective-C

Perl

PHP

Python

Ruby

SQL

HTML

Puppet

Less

Lisp

SCSS

Stylus

Go

Swift
entry.summary: Tranquilpeak Hexo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

entry.title: Tags plugins showcase
entry.content:

Alert

Read documentation to know how to use Alert tag

Quote from a book

Do not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy.

David LevithanWide Awake

Quote from Twitter

NEW: DevDocs now comes with syntax highlighting. http://devdocs.io

@DevDocstwitter.com/devdocs/status/356095192085962752

Quote from an article on the web

Every interaction is both precious and an opportunity to delight.

Seth GodinWelcome to Island Marketing

entry.summary: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.

entry.title: Video integrations showcase
entry.content:
Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

Youtube

Vimeo
entry.summary: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.
